metadata.title: "Cleopatra" Fair Trade Wooden Hair Pins - Set of Four
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "5.4 x 4 x 0.9 inches; 0.8 Ounces", "Item model number": "AEH220"}

categorization.explanation: The product is a set of hair pins, which are used for styling hair. Therefore, it fits best in the 'Hair Styling Accessories' subcategory under 'Hair Care' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
